chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
v: nat -> R
u: nat -> R
l: Rbar

Goal:
(forall n : nat, u n = v n) -> is_lim_seq u l -> is_lim_seq v l

Premises:
is_lim_seq = fun (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar) => filterlim u eventually (Rbar_locally l) : (nat -> R) -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
is_lim_seq_ext_loc : forall (u v : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), eventually (fun n : nat => u n = v n) -> is_lim_seq u l -> is_lim_seq v l
is_LimInf_seq_ext : forall (u v : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), (forall n : nat, u n = v n) -> is_LimInf_seq u l -> is_LimInf_seq v l
is_LimSup_seq_ext : forall (u v : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), (forall n : nat, u n = v n) -> is_LimSup_seq u l -> is_LimSup_seq v l
is_inf_seq_ext : forall (u v : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), (forall n : nat, u n = v n) -> is_inf_seq u l -> is_inf_seq v l
is_sup_seq_ext : forall (u v : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), (forall n : nat, u n = v n) -> is_sup_seq u l -> is_sup_seq v l
Sup_seq_ext : forall u v : nat -> Rbar, (forall n : nat, u n = v n) -> Sup_seq u = Sup_seq v
Inf_seq_ext : forall u v : nat -> Rbar, (forall n : nat, u n = v n) -> Inf_seq u = Inf_seq v
is_LimInf_seq_ext_loc : forall (u v : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), eventually (fun n : nat => u n = v n) -> is_LimInf_seq u l -> is_LimInf_seq v l
is_LimSup_seq_ext_loc : forall (u v : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), eventually (fun n : nat => u n = v n) -> is_LimSup_seq u l -> is_LimSup_seq v l
Lim_seq_ext_loc : forall u v : nat -> R, eventually (fun n : nat => u n = v n) -> Lim_seq u = Lim_seq v
is_LimSup_LimInf_lim_seq : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_LimSup_seq u l -> is_LimInf_seq u l -> is_lim_seq u l
is_lim_LimSup_seq : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_lim_seq u l -> is_LimSup_seq u l
is_lim_LimInf_seq : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_lim_seq u l -> is_LimInf_seq u l
ex_finite_lim_seq = fun u : nat -> R => exists l : R, is_lim_seq u l : (nat -> R) -> Prop Argument scope is [function_scope]
ex_lim_seq = fun u : nat -> R => exists l : Rbar, is_lim_seq u l : (nat -> R) -> Prop Argument scope is [function_scope]
is_lim_seq_Reals : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : R), is_lim_seq u l < -> Un_cv u l
is_lim_seq_spec : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_lim_seq' u l < -> is_lim_seq u l
is_sup_seq_lub : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), is_sup_seq u l -> Rbar_is_lub (fun x : Rbar => exists n : nat, x = u n) l
Rbar_is_glb_inf_seq : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), Rbar_is_glb (fun x : Rbar => exists n : nat, x = u n) l -> is_inf_seq u l
Rbar_is_lub_sup_seq : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), Rbar_is_lub (fun x : Rbar => exists n : nat, x = u n) l -> is_sup_seq u l
filter_imp : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x -> Q x) -> ?F P -> ?F Q where ?T : [u : nat -> R v : nat -> R l : Rbar |- Type] ?F : [u : nat -> R v : nat -> R l : Rbar |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [u : nat -> R v : nat -> R l : Rbar |- Filter ?F]
filterlim_locally : forall (f : ?T -> ?U) (y : ?U), filterlim f ?F (locally y) < -> (forall eps : posreal, ?F (fun x : ?T => ball y eps (f x))) where ?T : [u : nat -> R v : nat -> R l : Rbar |- Type] ?U : [u : nat -> R v : nat -> R l : Rbar |- UniformSpace] ?F : [u : nat -> R v : nat -> R l : Rbar |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [u : nat -> R v : nat -> R l : Rbar |- Filter ?F]
is_lim_seq_p_infty_Reals : forall u : nat -> R, is_lim_seq u p_infty < -> cv_infty u
filterlim_ext_loc : forall f g : ?T -> ?U, ?F (fun x : ?T => f x = g x) -> filterlim f ?F ?G -> filterlim g ?F ?G where ?T : [u : nat -> R v : nat -> R l : Rbar |- Type] ?U : [u : nat -> R v : nat -> R l : Rbar |- Type] ?F : [u : nat -> R v : nat -> R l : Rbar |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?G : [u : nat -> R v : nat -> R l : Rbar |- (?U -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [u : nat -> R v : nat -> R l : Rbar |- Filter ?F]
LPO_notforall : forall P : nat -> Prop, (forall n : nat, P n \/ ~ P n) -> ~ (forall n : nat, ~ P n) -> exists n : nat, P n
is_LimInf_seq = fun (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar) => match l with | Finite l0 => forall eps : posreal, (forall N : nat, exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\ u n < l0 + eps) /\ (exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> l0 - eps < u n) | p_infty => forall M : R, exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> M < u n | m_infty => forall (M : R) (N : nat), exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\ u n < M end : (nat -> R) -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
is_LimSup_seq = fun (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar) => match l with | Finite l0 => forall eps : posreal, (forall N : nat, exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\ l0 - eps < u n) /\ (exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> u n < l0 + eps) | p_infty => forall (M : R) (N : nat), exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\ M < u n | m_infty => forall M : R, exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> u n < M end : (nat -> R) -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
nat_ind : forall P : nat -> Prop, P 0%nat -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
is_LimInf_seq_scal_pos : forall (a : R) (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), 0 < a -> is_LimInf_seq u l -> is_LimInf_seq (fun n : nat => a * u n) (Rbar_mult a l)
is_LimSup_seq_scal_pos : forall (a : R) (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), 0 < a -> is_LimSup_seq u l -> is_LimSup_seq (fun n : nat => a * u n) (Rbar_mult a l)
is_LimSup_opp_LimInf_seq : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_LimSup_seq (fun n : nat => - u n) (Rbar_opp l) < -> is_LimInf_seq u l
is_LimInf_opp_LimSup_seq : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_LimInf_seq (fun n : nat => - u n) (Rbar_opp l) < -> is_LimSup_seq u l
is_sup_seq = fun (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar) => match l with | Finite l0 => forall eps : posreal, (forall n : nat, Rbar_lt (u n) (l0 + eps)) /\ (exists n : nat, Rbar_lt (l0 - eps) (u n)) | p_infty => forall M : R, exists n : nat, Rbar_lt M (u n) | m_infty => forall (M : R) (n : nat), Rbar_lt (u n) M end : (nat -> Rbar) -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
is_inf_seq = fun (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar) => match l with | Finite l0 => forall eps : posreal, (forall n : nat, Rbar_lt (l0 - eps) (u n)) /\ (exists n : nat, Rbar_lt (u n) (l0 + eps)) | p_infty => forall (M : R) (n : nat), Rbar_lt M (u n) | m_infty => forall M : R, exists n : nat, Rbar_lt (u n) M end : (nat -> Rbar) -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
is_lim_seq' = fun (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar) => match l with | Finite l0 => forall eps : posreal, eventually (fun n : nat => Rabs (u n - l0) < eps) | p_infty => forall M : R, eventually (fun n : nat => M < u n) | m_infty => forall M : R, eventually (fun n : nat => u n < M) end : (nat -> R) -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
is_sup_seq_major : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar) (n : nat), is_sup_seq u l -> Rbar_le (u n) l
is_LimInf_seq_ind_1 : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_LimInf_seq u l < -> is_LimInf_seq (fun n : nat => u (S n)) l
is_LimSup_seq_ind_1 : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_LimSup_seq u l < -> is_LimSup_seq (fun n : nat => u (S n)) l
is_LimInf_seq_unique : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_LimInf_seq u l -> LimInf_seq u = l
is_LimSup_seq_unique : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_LimSup_seq u l -> LimSup_seq u = l

```coq
intros Huv Hu.
apply is_lim_seq_ext_loc with (u := u).
- intros n. apply Huv.
- apply is_lim_LimSup_seq, is_lim_LimInf_seq with (u := u).
  assumption.
  apply is_LimInf_seq_unique, Hu.
Qed.```

original: intros Huv Hu. apply is_lim_seq_ext_loc with (u := u). - intros n. apply Huv. - apply is_lim_LimSup_seq, is_lim_LimInf_seq with (u := u). auto. apply is_LimInf_seq_unique, Hu.
